Terrain::AliasedHeightMap

Terrain::AliasedHeightMap Class Reference

This class implements an aliased heightmap that allows sampling of a lower resolution of a parent TerrainHeightMap2. More...

#include <aliased_height_map.hpp>

float height (uint32 x, uint32 z) const

Detailed Description

This class implements an aliased heightmap that allows sampling of a lower resolution of a parent TerrainHeightMap2.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AliasedHeightMap::AliasedHeightMap ( uint32  level,
TerrainHeightMap2Ptr  pParent 
)

This is the AliasedHeightMap constructor.

Parameters:
level The level that this AliasedHeightMap will represent.
pParent The parent TerrainHeightMap2.

Member Function Documentation

float AliasedHeightMap::height ( uint32  x,
uint32  z 
) const

This function samples the underlying TerrainHeightMap2 at this level.

Parameters:
x The x coordinate.
z The z coordinate.
Returns:
The height in the parent TerrainHeightMap2 at the given coordinates, taking into account the level of this mip-map.
